label: 寄進状
本: The Kamakura Bakufu:  A Study in Documents . Stanford University Press . 1976
説明文: A document for the commendation (endowment) of land. A kishinjō conveyed ownership rights to some higher authority, such as a temple or noble house, often preparatory to shōen incorporation. As a result of such commendations, donors were generally confirmed in a managerialcustodial authority, and recipients became proprietors (ryōke).　[領家]
